# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to revolutionize its industry. This product not only embodies cutting-edge technology but also offers unparalleled benefits that could significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its exceptional quality and innovative features, we believe it's worth more than a million dollars to us. We are offering you the opportunity to acquire this masterpiece at an exclusive price of $950000. This is a limited-time offer, so please consider it carefully. We look forward to discussing how this product can elevate your business or lifestyle. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $950,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $950,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,000,000
